section.heading: Waiver or reduction of permit fees for the occupation of public space, public rights of way, and public structures.
section.text: The Mayor may waive or reduce any permit fee, except for the application fee, to occupy or otherwise use public space, public rights of way, or public structures for a project that:

para.text: Is conducted by a Business Improvement District or Community Improvement District established pursuant to subchapter VIII of Chapter 12 of Title 2 [§ 2-1215.01 et seq.];
In the Mayor’s determination, serves a public benefit;
Does not impose costs on the District government; and

annotations.annotation: as added Dec. 2, 2011, D.C. Law 19-48, § 2, 58 DCR 8943
For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 2 of Public Space Permit Fee Waiver Emergency Amendment Act of 2011 (D.C. Act 19-163, October 11, 2011, 58 DCR 8892).
